verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֨ת <WH8141> In the year בֹּ֤א <WH935> came תַרְתָּן֙ <WH8661> that Tartan אַשְׁדּ֔וֹדָה <WH795> unto Ashdod בִּשְׁלֹ֣ח <WH7971> sent אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> סַֽרְג֖וֹן <WH5623> (when Sargon מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אַשּׁ֑וּר <WH804> of Assyria וַיִּלָּ֥חֶם <WH3898> him) and fought בְּאַשְׁדּ֖וֹד <WH795> against Ashdod וַֽיִּלְכְּדָֽהּ׃ <WH3920> and took

בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> At the same time הַהִ֗יא <WH1931> he דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָה֮ <WH3069> God בְּיַ֣ד <WH3027> by יְשַׁעְיָ֣הוּ <WH3470> Isaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אָמוֹץ֮ <WH531> of Amoz לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> saying לֵ֗ךְ <WH1980> walking וּפִתַּחְתָּ֤ <WH6605> and loose הַשַּׂק֙ <WH8242> the sackcloth מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> from מָתְנֶ֔יךָ <WH4975> from off thy loins וְנַעַלְךָ֥ <WH5275> thy shoe תַחֲלֹ֖ץ <WH2502> and put off מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> and רַגְלֶ֑יךָ <WH7272> from thy foot וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> And he did so כֵּ֔ן <WH3651> so הָלֹ֖ךְ <WH1980> going עָר֥וֹם <WH6174> naked וְיָחֵֽף׃ <WH3182> and barefoot ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> And the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after הָלַ֛ךְ <WH1980> hath walked עַבְדִּ֥י <WH5650> Like as my servant יְשַׁעְיָ֖הוּ <WH3470> Isaiah עָר֣וֹם <WH6174> naked וְיָחֵ֑ף <WH3182> and barefoot שָׁלֹ֤שׁ <WH7969> three שָׁנִים֙ <WH8141> years א֣וֹת <WH226> [for] a sign וּמוֹפֵ֔ת <WH4159> and wonder עַל־ <WH5921> against מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> upon Egypt וְעַל־ <WH5921> against כּֽוּשׁ׃ <WH3568> and upon Ethiopia

כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> so יִנְהַ֣ג <WH5090> lead away מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> So shall the king אַ֠שּׁוּר <WH804> of Assyria אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁבִ֨י <WH7628> prisoners מִצְרַ֜יִם <WH4714> the Egyptians וְאֶת־ <WH853> גָּל֥וּת <WH1546> captives כּ֛וּשׁ <WH3568> and the Ethiopians נְעָרִ֥ים <WH5288> young וּזְקֵנִ֖ים <WH2205> and old עָר֣וֹם <WH6174> naked וְיָחֵ֑ף <WH3182> and barefoot וַחֲשׂוּפַ֥י <WH2834> uncovered שֵׁ֖ת <WH8357> even with [their] buttocks עֶרְוַ֥ת <WH6172> to the shame מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וְחַתּ֖וּ <WH2865> And they shall be afraid וָבֹ֑שׁוּ <WH954> and ashamed מִכּוּשׁ֙ <WH3568> of Ethiopia מַבָּטָ֔ם <WH4007> their expectation וּמִן־ <WH4480> because מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> and of Egypt תִּפְאַרְתָּֽם׃ <WH8597> their glory

וְ֠אָמַר <WH559> shall say יֹשֵׁ֨ב <WH3427> And the inhabitant הָאִ֣י <WH339> of this isle הַזֶּה֮ <WH2088> he בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> in that day הַהוּא֒ <WH1931> he הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold כֹ֣ה <WH3541> Behold such מַבָּטֵ֗נוּ <WH4007> [is] our expectation אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after נַ֤סְנוּ <WH5127> whither we flee שָׁם֙ <WH8033> for לְעֶזְרָ֔ה <WH5833> for help לְהִ֨נָּצֵ֔ל <WH5337> to be delivered מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> from מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אַשּׁ֑וּר <WH804> of Assyria וְאֵ֖יךְ <WH349> how נִמָּלֵ֥ט <WH4422> and how shall we escape אֲנָֽחְנוּ׃ <WH587> ourselves ס
